title: How do you interpret concentration checks?

posts.author: MonkeyBusinessDM
posts.content:

posts.thread_title: How do you interpret concentration checks?

posts.author: WarlocksWisdom
posts.content:
Looking at page 127 of the Player's Handbook, it states that checks? functions based on your proficiency bonus and ability modifiers.

When DMing, I like to use checks? as a way to create interesting challenges for my players.

Has anyone tried optimizing a build around checks?? I'm curious about the best way to leverage this for my character.

posts.author: NaturalTwenty
posts.content:
For my next character, I want to focus on concentration as a central feature. What subclasses or multiclass options would work best with this?

I've been playing a Tiefling Rogue in my campaign, and I've noticed that concentration really impacts how effective the character is in combat.
